title: drp hold their annual summer conference and are set to have record breaking year
text:
drp hold their annual summer conference and are set to have record breaking year drp hold their annual summer conference and are set to have record breaking year Details Category: Agency & Association   12:30 drp held their annual summer conference on Thursday 9th July at their main studios 212 in Hartlebury, all 171 team members attended the day of divisional meetings, business update, teambuilding activities and a showcase of each department, ending with drinks and a BBQ on the studio lawns. Dale Parmenter, group CEO led the conference with the theme of ‘realising our potential’ including a video recap of the extravagant 35th anniversary event, profit update and forecasts, embedding company values within our work and the positive future for drp ahead. 
Parmenter announced the business being on course to hit financial targets with the business currently at 65% of its turnover and gross profit targets. The company is just over half way through the year, but looking set to have best financial business year to date. The day began with 4 separate divisional meetings from comms, media, live and business support. The directors of each department headed up the session which saw the drpteam join together to brainstorm several business related questions and scenarios which would be presented to the team as a whole later in the day. The team also had a chance to do some “speed networking” with the drp board and senior management team, allowing the team to ask questions and get updates on what they are doing to drive the business forward from their roles and divisions. The teambuilding element of the day was designed to encourage and share creativity, using an interactive monopoly style game. The summer conference came to a close with a summer BBQ and drinks on the studio lawns. Dale Parmenter; Group CEO commented “Our annual summer conference is an integral event in our yearly calendar. It allows us to come together as an entire team under one roof, share creativity, realise our potential and build relationships. We are all extremely excited for the future of the business and it is events like these that ensure we are all indeed realising and utilising our huge potential”. Related articles
